Announcements

Urgent
March 19, 2024

Open Enrollment for Benefits Starts April 1st

Annual open enrollment for health, dental, vision, and supplemental benefits begins April 1st and closes April 15th. Review your plan options in the Benefits Guide. Contact benefits@res-llc.com with questions.

Sarah Mitchell, HR Director

Policy
March 17, 2024

New Hybrid Work Policy Effective May 1st

Following employee feedback, RES LLC is updating our hybrid work guidelines. Employees may work remotely up to 3 days per week with manager approval. Full policy details will be posted in the Employee Handbook.

James Caldwell, COO

Events
March 14, 2024

Q1 All-Hands Meeting — March 28th at 2 PM

Join us for our Q1 All-Hands on March 28th at 2:00 PM in the Main Conference Room (Building A) or via Zoom. CEO David Reynolds will share company performance, Q2 priorities, and take employee questions.

Maria Gonzalez, Executive Assistant
